options.name: add
options.description: Adds a new quote.

options.name: name
options.description: Internal name of the quote to add.

options.name: tags
options.description: Comma seperated list of tags to attach to the new quote.

options.name: imageurl
options.description: The screenshot image to use.

options.name: delete
options.description: Deletes a quote.

options.name: name
options.description: Internal name of the quote to delete.

options.name: print
options.description: Displays a quote by internal name.

options.name: name
options.description: Internal name of the quote to display.

options.name: list
options.description: Lists quotes.

options.name: terms
options.description: Comma seperated list of search terms to filter to.

options.name: modify_tags
options.description: Modifies a quote's tags.

options.name: name
options.description: Internal name of the quote to delete.

options.name: tags
options.description: Comma seperated list of tags. This OVERWRITES the previous list!

options.name: alias
options.description: Manages quote search aliases.

options.name: add
options.description: Adds a new quote search alias.

options.name: key
options.description: Internal key of the alias to add.

options.name: values
options.description: Comma seperated list of alias values to add.

options.name: delete
options.description: Deletes a quote search alias.

options.name: key
options.description: Internal key of the quote search alias to delete.

options.name: print
options.description: Displays a quote search alias by internal key.

options.name: key
options.description: Internal key of the quote search alias to display.

options.name: list
options.description: Lists quote search aliases.

options.name: values
options.description: Comma seperated list of values to filter to.

options.name: modify_values
options.description: Deletes a quote search alias.

options.name: key
options.description: Internal name of the quote search alias to delete.

options.name: values
options.description: Comma seperated list of values. This OVERWRITES the previous list!
